body.name: Wireless Lavalier Lapel Microphone for iPhone iPad - Professional Video Recording Lav Mic, 2 Clip-on Microphones for YouTube Interview Vlog Livestream & Podcast
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 15 mins
features: 1 Receiver with 2 Transmitters: This mini wireless lavalier microphone kit has 1 receiver and 2 transmitters included, which makes it possible to record sound or video from both 2 parties at the same time. Also, you can use just one mic alone for interviewing, vlogging,live streaming, podcasting or online meeting

360° Rotatable Clip: Different from others, we have updated the microphone clips with 360 degree rotation feature, which means that you can change to any direction you want while you’re making recordings. More importantly, the microphone’s clip can be largely protected from being broken easily, because you don’t have to take it off your microphone before changing directions

Real Time Monitoring: Equipped with monitoring system, you can monitor the recordings while they are being made by inserting USB-C earphones to the interface of the microphone. In this way, you can clearly know what content will be recorded by the microphone and make necessary adjustment to make your recordings more accurate

Easy Connection, Plug & Play: The smart clip-on microphone is much easier to use than other microphones. Just get the receiver to your devices and turn on the power switch of the transmitters, the two parts will get connected successfully and auto paired immediately. Then you can start to record voice or videos without opening extra app or bluetooth in your cellphone

Smart Wireless System & Hands-Free: The cordless lav mic is inserted with bluetooth technology that allows you no longer to be restricted to the length of the wire while recording. You can just clip the microphone on your shirt to free your hand and recording at a remote distance. Without messy wire, it will be very convenient for you to record on different social media platforms like Youtube, Tiktok and etc.

Omnidirectional Sound & Noise Cancellation: This portable lapel mic is equipped with little spray-proof sponge foam and high sensitive microphone, which can pick up sounds from all directions and offer you clear recordings. Besides, with innovative noise reduction technology, noise is blocked from your surrounding environment to ensure you a quality sound and better experience

Compatible with iOS Devices: The small upgraded lapel mic is compatible with iOS system and can be use with iPhone and iPad. Without usb c type interface connected to your mobile phone, it can not be used with android devices

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CN810-Professional Wireless Lavalier Lapel Microphone -- 2 wireless microphones Do you have any problems about how to get your voice clearly recorded when filming or making audio/video recordings? Are you upset that you cannot stand far away when having a live broadcast due to the messy wire that keeps you within a fixed range and cannot move your body freely? Do you feel annoyed when there is any noise in your recordings and don’t know how to get rid of it? No worries anymore, with wireless design and noise reduction technology, our lavalier lapel microphone is a better choice for you. Plug & Play Just get seconds to plug the receiver to your devices and power on your microphones, they will get paired and auto sync. By clipping the lav mic on your collar or just hold in your hand, you can start audio/video recording. （If it's paired successfully but recording is failed , please try to re-plug the receiver）

Special Notice to Help Your Recordings: 1. Please make sure your device is unlocked and the green light flashes after the receiver is plugged to your smart phone. 2. Press the power switch of the microphone for about 1 second to turn it on. If the green light for both of receiver and transmitter always keeps on, it means they paired successfully. 3. Equipped with monitoring system, you can monitor the recordings while they are being made by inserting USB-C earphones to the interface of the microphone. 4. Press the power switch of the microphone very softly, the green light will keep flashing, which means the recording was paused. By pressing the button again, it will stop flashing and the recording will continue. 5. Any time when you see the red light & green light flashes alternately, it means the connection is failed and you need to restart. 6. Press and hold the power switch for about 3 seconds to power off the microphone. 7. Please unplug the receiver before listening to your recordings. 8. The usb charging cable is used to charge the microphone, not the receiver. The receiver itself has no need to be charged. PS: Please follow up the instructions step by step and we will always stand by if you have any problems while recording.

Special Notice to Help Your Recordings: 1. Please make sure your device is unlocked and the green light flashes after the receiver is plugged to your smart phone. 2. Press the power switch of the microphone for about 1 second to turn it on. If the green light for both of receiver and transmitter always keeps on, it means they paired successfully. 3. Equipped with monitoring system, you can monitor the recordings while they are being made by inserting USB-C earphones to the interface of the microphone. 4. Press the power switch of the microphone very softly, the green light will keep flashing, which means the recording was paused. By pressing the button again, it will stop flashing and the recording will continue. 5. Any time when you see the red light & green light flashes alternately, it means the connection is failed and you need to restart. 6. Press and hold the power switch for about 3 seconds to power off the microphone. 7. Please unplug the receiver before listening to your recordings. 8. The usb charging cable is used to charge the microphone, not the receiver. The receiver itself has no need to be charged. PS: Please follow up the instructions step by step and we will always stand by if you have any problems while recording.

360° Rotating Clip The clip can be changed to any direction you want without taking off the clip while recording, which can help to protect clip from being broken while changing directions. 360°Omnidirectional Pickup Equipped with high density spray-proof sponge and high sensitive microphone, sound can be received in all directions Long Battery Working Time Build in 3.7V/65MAH rechargeable safety battery, the bluetooth lav mic can keep working up to 5 hours or so and about two hours charging time only.

Strong Compatibility The black lapel microphone is designed to work with iOS 9.0 system or above and can be use with iPhone iPad, tablet etc. Applicable for Youtube, Tiktok, Blog etc. Charging while Recording Just plug your phone charger into the interface port of the receiver, the mobile phone can be charged through the interface. Compact & Lightweight With total weight 0.7oz only, you can attach it to your clothes and carry it easily by putting it in your pocket or clipping on your shirt to free your hands
Widely Used No matter it’s indoor or outdoor audio/video recording, this is a wonderful choice for vloggers, youtubers, bloggers, livestreamers, reporters, broadcaster, anchors and videographers
Packing List 1 x Receiver with Lightning Plug2 x Transmitters with Back Clip1 x USB A to Type C Charging Cable1 x User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive for the Price!
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new mic for my job, but I didn’t want to break the bank on one (the last one I had was $70+ investment and didn’t work well). I’m so glad I found this mic pack. It works well and is so easy to use. The wireless connection is a huge plus! Other mics require batteries that I went through so fast, but this set is rechargeable through a cable (and having a second mic as a backup is great if the first one needs to charge). The voice quality is good, but I’m actually more impressed by the noise cancellation! My job has phones ringing, conversations happening, and music playing when I use the mic, and none of these have been picked up by the mic yet! For one of the cheaper sets available for purchase, you really can’t go wrong with this one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For the Price - AMAZINGLY GREAT!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The Vid is using the mic clipped on my chest and receiver is plugged into iPhone 13 Pro Max. It sounds pretty good and as a YouTuber and Professional Content Creator I wanted a small, fast and easy external mic for the YouTube Shorts and the occasional vids shot spur of the moment on the iPhone. Stupid easy to use, quick and the sound is pretty good but I would add a little compression and depth in post editing. The insane part is in this little video I just shot so I could check it out as soon as it arrived, there is a Bluetooth speaker in kitchen rocking out and the TV in the room I’m standing in was on. It completely cut out both and all you hear is ME!! Just before I put the mic on I made video with just the iPhone internal mic to be able to compare and you can hear the TV and the music playing in the background very much…. almost overwhelming my voice! For the crazy cheap price, what a great purchase!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND this. Yeah, you could drop $300 and run a Rode GoMic || but have fun with setting up dongle and supporting the receiver connected to iPhone with mounting bracket and tripod. To get the simple, easy and fast iPhone shots, this is by far the way to go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game Changer for Audio Recording!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using the PGDLOF Wireless Lavalier Lapel Microphone for a while now, and I must say, it’s been a game changer. The freedom of movement without any cords is liberating, and the absence of cord shortages is a huge plus.The microphones work exceptionally well. The sound quality is more than just acceptable; it’s impressive. I’ve even used them to record songs and play around on the Rapchat app. The audio clarity has added a professional touch to my tracks.One of the highlights was doing an unboxing video with these mics. The excitement of unboxing was matched by the performance of these mics. I’ve been using them ever since that day, and they haven’t let me down.In conclusion, the PGDLOF Wireless Lavalier Lapel Microphone is a fantastic product. It’s reliable, delivers great sound, and offers the convenience of being wireless. I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a professional-grade lapel microphone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my dad to use for his channel that he's starting, and after one test, I can tell you that for $20, this is a good pair of mics. Between the easy setup and installation, this would be the perfect easy beginner set for someone who isn't quite sure about mics or if they'll use them.All I did was connect the adapter to my phone, turn on one of the fully charged mics, and brought it out to his shop where he has possibly one of the loudest dehumidifiers known to man, and recorded with a testing video. Even with me speaking loud, absolutely no background noise! The only problem is these sound muffled, but not too muffled. You can still make out what someone is saying.One last final thing is when editing your clips, you may do better with audio separated from your phone and mic, so I suggest buying/downloading a recorder that has multiple tracks on it. No software is required, but I do suggest it for someone who is trying to make professional videos :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This microphone is everything I expected! I’ve recently gotten into creating content and this mic is great for it. It creates a crisper, cleaner, louder sound than if I were to just record using my iPhone mic. I didn’t want to fully commit to the price of a full studio microphone set up quite yet, and this was honestly the perfect in between step for me. Super easy to set up and use and I appreciate the fact that it comes with 2 microphones and clips. 5 stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Lots of weird clicks and interference
reviews.reviewText: It's easy to use so I'll give it that. When the audio does come through it's very good. But there are all these strange clicks and sounds that also come through. Doesn't matter where you clip that thing it'll find a reason to make weird noises.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works exactly as advertised! I was hesitant about getting this, but it work’s excellently! I am able to connect to my tablet for recording videos, and it works perfectly from over 10 feet away! Easy to turn on and off, holds charge for over 2 hours with consistent use, and the noise cancellation was pretty good as well! - definitely would recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best mics.
reviews.reviewText: I loved everything about this mic, the sound quality is tremendous it has a great range, and really good noise cancellation . It is very good for people that are vlogging. This product was one of my best purchases.

reviews.reviewTitle: Cheap product and lacking a charger for the receiver!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Definitely not worth it. Product looks very cheap and receiver doesn’t even have a charger. Definitely asking for a refund.
